A '''Grass Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Grass-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh |- | Bulbasaur || | Chickorita || Treecko || Turtwig |- | Oddish || | Hoppip || Roselia || Carnivine |- | Bellsprout || | Sunkern || Tropius || |- | Tangela || | || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Lavender Town || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Eterna City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Verdanturf Town || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Azalea City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |} {{Eggs}}
